sentences: Yvonne Lefébure (29 June 1898, Ermont – 23 January 1986, Paris) was a French pianist and teacher.
Born in Ermont, she studied with Alfred Cortot at the Conservatoire de Paris, taking a premier prix in piano and numerous other subjects.
Carbou, Yvette, La leçon de musique d’Yvonne Lefébure, 1995 (with discography).
